plot: The film documents a true creative process while David Garcia is recording his first solo album. He is sharing his original music with his usual long time collaborators as well as some distinguished guests that visit the studios. We get a rare chance to closely follow his work with his artistic producer, the recording technicians and the group of musicians that gathered all here to create art in its purest form. The film consists of real time rehearsals, recordings and stolen moments of interviews in between the numbers. The film gives a true and realistic sense of what music creation is all about.   Written by  SJK
title: Brooklyn Is For Lovers
